name: Freecomers: Film Industry Platform
description: A networking platform for film professionals with profiles, job listings, chat, and collaboration tools. Built with ReactJS and Laravel APIs.

name: Autovertest: Testing Tool
description: A web testing tool for automating test flows using React, React Flow, and JavaScript with a user-friendly interface.

name: Flexy: Online Shopping App
description: An e-commerce app for browsing, selecting, and securely purchasing a wide range of products.

name: ITI Lakhipur Website
description: Official site of ITI Lakhipur, offering vocational training info and updates. Built using WordPress CMS.

name: Weather Forecast App
description: A weather app showing real-time updates and forecasts based on location using Rapid API.

name: Analog Clock with Alarm
description: A custom analog clock with alarm functionality built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Company Portfolio Website
description: A company portfolio website to showcase the projects, team, and services offered.

name: JFTA Acting School
description: A website for the JFTA Acting School showcasing their programs, faculty, and admission process.

name: Restaurant Website
description: A responsive website for a restaurant showcasing the menu, ambiance, and reservation options.
